required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Comparison of Corneal Aberrations in Subjects With Contralateral AcrySof IQ Toric Intraocular Lens (IOL) and AcrySof IQ IOL With Limbal Relaxing Incision (LRI)
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Contralateral Comparison of Corneal Aberrations in Subjects Undergoing Aspheric Lens Implantation With Concomitant LRI and Aspheric Toric IOL Implantation

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study was to evaluate and compare postoperative corneal aberrations and visual parameters in patients contralaterally implanted with an AcrySof IQ Toric intraocular lens (IOL) and AcrySof IQ Aspheric IOL with concomitant limbal relaxing incision.

arm_group.description: AcrySof IQ Toric intraocular lens (IOL) randomly assigned to one eye, with AcrySof IQ Aspheric IOL with Limbal Relaxing Incision (LRI) procedure in the fellow eye for contralateral implantation.
AcrySof IQ Aspheric intraocular lens (IOL) with Limbal Relaxing Incision (LRI) procedure randomly assigned to one eye, with AcrySof IQ Toric IOL in the fellow eye for contralateral implantation

intervention.description: AcrySof IQ Toric intraocular lens implanted in the capsular bag of the eye during cataract surgery. The IOL is intended for the lifetime of the patient.
intervention.other_name: AcrySof IQ Toric IOL Model SN6AT3
AcrySof IQ Toric IOL Model SN6AT4
AcrySof IQ Toric IOL Model SN6AT5

intervention.description: AcrySof IQ aspheric intraocular lens implanted in the capsular bag of the eye during cataract surgery. The IOL is intended for the lifetime of the patient.
intervention.other_name: AcrySof IQ Aspheric IOL Model SN60WF

intervention.description: An incision was made at the corneal-limbal junction during cataract surgery for the purpose of relaxing corneal curvature, ie., correcting astigmatism.

facility.name: Contact Alcon Call Center for Trial Locations
